contents.contents: Retrace your steps and cross the Jouy door. Turn left and walk along the “Allée des Lépreux”, then walk on the Ramparts alley.
In the past, the ramparts of Provins were the strongest in France. Strolling along the ramparts will give you an idea of how impressive the construction which circled the town was.

question.contents: In your opinion, how long are the ramparts?

explanations.contents: Today, they are 1200 metres long with 22 towers. Originally, they were 5000 metres long.
